info.title: Confidential Ledger
info.description: Write and retrieve ledger entries against the Confidential Ledger service.

parameters.name: ledgerEndpoint
parameters.description: The Confidential Ledger URL, for example https://contoso.confidentialledger.azure.com.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of collection ids present in the Confidential Ledger
get.description: Collection ids are user-created collections of ledger entries

get.summary: Gets quotes for all nodes of the Confidential Ledger.
get.description:
A quote is an SGX enclave measurement that can be used to verify the validity
of a node and its enclave.

get.summary: Gets the constitution used for governance.
get.description:
The constitution is a script that assesses and applies proposals from
consortium members.
Consortium members can manage the Confidential Ledger.

get.summary: Gets details on a list of users.
get.description: All users' object IDs and multiple roles will be returned.

get.summary: Gets a user with multiple roles.
get.description: Gets a user with multiple roles.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

patch.summary: Adds a user or updates a user's fields.
patch.description: A JSON merge patch is applied for existing users

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

parameters.name: userMultipleRoles
parameters.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user with multiple roles.

delete.summary: Deletes a user with multiple roles from the Confidential Ledger.
delete.description: Deletes a user with multiple roles from the Confidential Ledger.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.summary: Gets role actions for user defined roles
get.description: user defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

put.summary: Creates new roles and their actions
put.description: User defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

patch.summary:
Patch replaces the allowed action on existing roles,if the desire is to remove
an existing action, the role must be deleted and recreated.
patch.description: User defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

delete.description:
A user defined role allows the users to create and manage their own role
actions using the API.

get.summary: Gets ledger entries from a collection corresponding to a range.
get.description:
A collection id may optionally be specified. Only entries in the specified (or
default) collection will be returned.

parameters.name: fromTransactionId
parameters.description: Specify the first transaction ID in a range.

parameters.name: toTransactionId
parameters.description: Specify the last transaction ID in a range.

post.description: A collection id may optionally be specified.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

get.summary:
Gets the ledger entry at the specified transaction id. A collection id may
optionally be specified to indicate the collection from which to fetch the
value.
get.description:
To return older ledger entries, the relevant sections of the ledger must be
read from disk and validated. To prevent blocking within the enclave, the
response will indicate whether the entry is ready and part of the response, or
if the loading is still ongoing.

get.summary: Gets a receipt certifying ledger contents at a particular transaction id.
get.description: Gets a receipt certifying ledger contents at a particular transaction id.

get.summary: Gets the status of an entry identified by a transaction id.
get.description: Gets the status of an entry identified by a transaction id.

get.summary: Gets the current value available in the ledger.
get.description: A collection id may optionally be specified.
Returns the user defined endpoint in the ACL instance

put.description: Creates the user defined endpoint in the ACL instance

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

get.description: It gets the module for the user defined endpoint.

parameters.name: module_name
parameters.description: module name of the user defined endpoint

get.summary: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.
get.description: It returns the runtime options

patch.summary: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of user defined functions present in the Confidential Ledger
get.description: User defined functions stored in the Confidential Ledger
Returns the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

put.description: Creates the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

parameters.name: userDefinedFunction
parameters.description: Specify a user defined function of a Confidential Ledger.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

delete.summary: Deletes a user defined function from the Confidential Ledger.
delete.description: Deletes a user defined function from the Confidential Ledger.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: Executes the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

parameters.name: userDefinedFunctionExecutionProperties
parameters.description: Specify user defined function execution properties.

get.summary: Gets details on a list of users.
get.description: All users' object IDs and single role per user will be returned.
Gets a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

patch.summary: Adds a user or updates a user's fields.
patch.description: A JSON merge patch is applied for existing users

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

parameters.name: userDetails
parameters.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

delete.summary: Deletes a user from the Confidential Ledger.
delete.description: Deletes a user from the Confidential Ledger.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

ApplicationClaim.description: A claim of a ledger application.

digest.description: An application claim in digested form.

kind.description: Represents the kind of an application claim.

ledgerEntry.description: An application claim derived from ledger entry data.

ApplicationClaimKind.description: Represents the kind of an application claim.

values.name: LedgerEntry
values.description: Claim derived from a ledger entry

ApplicationClaimProtocol.description:
Represents the protocol to be used to compute the digest of a claim from the
given claim data.

Bundle.description: bundle for the user defined endpoints

ClaimDigest.description: An application claim in digested form.

value.description: The digest of the application claim, in hexadecimal form.

protocol.description:
Represents the protocol to be used to compute the digest of a claim from the
given claim data.

ConfidentialLedgerCommon.ConfidentialLed.description: An error response from Confidential Ledger.

error.description: An error response from Confidential Ledger.

ConfidentialLedgerCommon.ConfidentialLed.description: An error response from Confidential Ledger.

ConfidentialLedgerEnclaves.description: Information about the enclaves running the Confidential Ledger.

currentNodeId.description: Id of the Confidential Ledger node responding to the request.

enclaveQuotes.description: Dictionary of enclave quotes, indexed by node id.

Consortium.description: List of members in the consortium.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

ConsortiumMember.description: Describes a member of the consortium.

certificate.description: PEM-encoded certificate associated with the member.

Constitution.description: The governance script for the application.

digest.description: SHA256 digest of the constitution script.

mrenclave.description: MRENCLAVE value of the code running in the enclave.

raw.description: Raw SGX quote, parsable by tools like Open Enclave's oeverify.

forwarding_required.description: Indicates whether request forwarding is required for this endpoint.

mode.description: The operation mode for this endpoint.

ForwardingRequired.description: Indicates whether request forwarding is required for this operation.

key.description: Key for the interpreter reuse policy.

JsRuntimeOptions.description: JS runtime options for user defined endpoints and functions

log_exception_details.description: Whether to log exception details in the runtime.

return_exception_details.description: Whether to return exception details in the response.

collectionId.description: The collection identifier for this ledger entry.

transactionId.description:
A unique identifier for the state of the ledger. If returned as part of a
LedgerEntry, it indicates the state from which the entry was read.

preHooks.description:
List of user defined function hooks to be executed before the ledger entry is
written.

postHooks.description:
List of user defined function hooks to be executed after the ledger entry is
written.

LedgerEntryClaim.description: An application claim derived from ledger entry data.

protocol.description:
Represents the protocol to be used to compute the digest of a claim from the
given claim data.

LedgerQueryResult.description:
The result of querying for a ledger entry from an older transaction id. The
ledger entry is available in the response only if the returned state is Ready.

entry.description:
The ledger entry found as a result of the query. This is only available if the
query is in Ready state.

LedgerUser.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

userId.description:
Identifier for the user. This must either be an AAD object id or a certificate
fingerprint.

LedgerUserMultipleRoles.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

userId.description:
Identifier for the user. This must either be an AAD object id or a certificate
fingerprint.

LedgerWriteResult.description:
Returned as a result of a write to the Confidential Ledger, the transaction id
in the response indicates when the write will become durable.

collectionId.description: The collection identifier of the ledger entry.

MerkleProofElement.description: An item in the Merkle proof.

left.description: The left hash value in the Merkle proof element.

right.description: The right hash value in the Merkle proof element.

endpoints.description: A map of path to method endpoints for the path

MethodToEndpointProperties.description: Maps methods to their corresponding endpoint properties.

get.description: Properties for GET method endpoint.

Mode.description: Represents the operation mode of the endpoint.

PagedCollections.description: Paginated collections returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedLedgerEntries.description: Paginated ledger entries returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedLedgerUsers.description: Paginated users returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedUserDefinedFunctions.description: Paginated user defined functions returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedUsers.description: Paginated users returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

ReceiptLeafComponents.description: Components that make up a receipt leaf node.

RedirectionStrategy.description: Represents the redirection strategy for the endpoint.

roleName.description: name of the user defined role

RoleAssignment.description: Object for assigning a role to a user.

TransactionReceipt.description: A receipt certifying the transaction at the specified id.

receipt.description: The receipt contents for the transaction.

transactionId.description:
A unique identifier for the state of the ledger. If returned as part of a
LedgerEntry, it indicates the state from which the entry was read.

TransactionState.description: Represents the state of the transaction.

TransactionStatus.description: Response returned to a query for the transaction status

state.description: Represents the state of the transaction.

transactionId.description:
A unique identifier for the state of the ledger. If returned as part of a
LedgerEntry, it indicates the state from which the entry was read.

UserDefinedFunction.description: A user defined function in the ledger.

code.description: Code of the user defined function in JavaScript.

id.description: ID of the user defined function.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionError.description:
The error object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only
when the user defined function execution throws an exception.

message.description: Message indicating the error thrown when executing the function.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionProperties.description: The properties for executing a user defined function.

arguments.description: Runtime arguments of the user defined function. Defaults to an empty list.

exportedFunctionName.description:
Name of the exported function to execute in the code of the user defined
function. Defaults to main.

runtimeOptions.description: JS runtime options for user defined endpoints and functions

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionResponse.description: The result of a user defined function execution.

error.description:
The error object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only
when the user defined function execution throws an exception.

result.description:
The result object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only
when the user defined function executes successfully.

status.description: Represents the status of a user defined function execution.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionResult.description:
The result object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only
when the user defined function executes successfully.

returnValue.description:
String-encoded value returned by the user defined function execution. If the
function does not return any value, this is set to an empty string.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionStatus.description: Represents the status of a user defined function execution.

UserDefinedFunctionHook.description: Hook for a user defined function execution.

functionId.description: ID of the user defined function to execute.

properties.description: The properties for executing a user defined function.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.
